messages.text:
There needs to be a test, probably in gofix.

The code does not look right - EndPos should only
affect the End, not the Pos - but once there is a test
maybe we can better determine what the fix is.

Russ

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

I have no idea why this works all of a sudden,
but I verified that the tests I added at the same
time that I wrote the comment are still working,
the new code looks better, and you have a new
test that passes.  Good enough.

Please delete the commented-out comment.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=070daa8f8dc6 ***

go/ast: respect ImportSpec.EndPos

Fixes issue 2566.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5541068

Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>
